name: Fairy Catcher Live
blurb: FCL is a kid friendly real-time location based augmented reality game oriented towards getting players to get out and run around.

rewards.reward:
Startup Level
- Non-transferable copy of the game for every handheld platform it is released on.
- Device sticker made of vinyl or polyester for every handheld platform.
- Startup Member Status account on the community web site for one year.

Startup Level
- Everything in the previous categories.
- Game Updates for one year for every handheld platform it is released on.
- Twenty-five random fairies to be released from your handheld.

Donor Level
- Everything in the previous categories.
- Single transfer copies of the game for every handheld platform it is released on.
- Laptop sized vinyl or polyester sticker reflecting Donor Status.
- Recurring random Fairy at a specific real-world location for one year.
- Fifty random random fairies to be released from your handheld.

Donor Level
- Everything in the previous categories at Donor Status.
- T-Shirt reflecting Donor Status.
- One hundred random fairies to be released from your handheld.

Patron Level
- Everything in the previous categories at Patron Status.
- Recurring random fairy associated with a specific real-world location for six months.
- Fairy Feeder to attract fairies to a real-world location for six months.
- 128 character entry in listings of supporters.
- In-game 'Supporter' marker associated with a real-world location for six months.

Patron Level
- Everything in the previous categories at Patron Status.
- Recurring random fairy associated with a specific real-world location for the life of FCL.
- Recurring custom fairy at a specific real-world location for one year.
- Fairy Feeder to attract fairies to a real-world location for one year.
- 256 character entry in listings of supporters.
- In-game 'Supporter' marker associated with a real-world location for one year.

Founder
- Everything in the previous categories at Patron Status.
- Fairy Feeder to attract fairies to a real-world location for the life of FCL.
- Recurring custom fairy at a specific real-world location for the life of FCL.
- Donor member information entry reflecting Patron Status.
- In-game 'Supporter' marker associated with a real-world location for the life of FCL.
